professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in performance tuning, transactional replication, and database mirroring. Proficient in optimizing database systems for high performance and supporting large-scale applications across cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured SQL Server 2005/2000 on new servers with service packs.
Migrated databases from SQL Server 2000 to SQL Server 2005.
Expertise in setting up and troubleshooting Database mirroring.
Worked on log shipping for synchronization of database.
Expertise in working with Transactional Replication Environment and handled the publication conflicts manually depending on last changed date.
Checked the configuration and performance of the existing databases including data file allocation
fragmentation and the impact on system performance.

technical_skills:
SQL Server Administration",
            "Database Mirroring",
            "Transactional Replication",
            "Performance Tuning",
            "Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)",
            "Query Tuning",
